resources.string: This application was created by Kizeev Ilya, 951002.
The button you just pressed, here you can find information about the game.
By pressing this button, information about the records is displayed.
By pressing this button, you can post the current result to the social network.
By pressing this button, you can save you result.
The goal of this game is to score as many points as possible. You score increases with the press of a button "FEED".
You score is displayed in the field "Satiety"
